attributes.additional_details: There are to many refugees and asylum seekers already you complain about stretched recourses but you dont take the fall out for paying for aslum seeker its the common people who suffer and its our money you use to keep them not yours
attributes.background: Look after british people first asylum seekers get what we need help

rejection.details:
Under international law, it is legal for a person to apply for asylum in any country that has signed the 1951 Geneva Convention and to remain there until the authorities have assessed their claim.

You could start a new petition asking the UK Government to withdraw from international treaties that give people the right to seek asylum in the UK, if that's what you'd like to happen.
